item.title: A Modern debugging experience using DevTools
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This talk covers modern techniques for JavaScript code. We’ll cover debugging on the web and Node.js. Say goodbye to console.log’s because where we’re going, we won’t need them! A combination of smart breakpoints & live code editing will be enough to solve most common issues. In addition to JS debugging, we’ll take a look at […]
item.content:encoded: This talk covers modern techniques for JavaScript code. We’ll cover debugging on the web and Node.js. Say goodbye to console.log’s because where we’re going, we won’t need them! A combination of smart breakpoints & live code editing will be enough to solve most common issues. In addition to JS debugging, we’ll take a look at some hidden DevTools secrets and recently landed features.
